title: HeatmiserV3 - Reply schema
description: Messaging schema for receiving messages via the heatmiserV3 protocol

frameLengthLow.description: frameLength, crc included. 7 (when write) or 11+n (when read)

frameLengthHigh.description: frameLength, crc included. 7 (when write) or 11+n (when read)

sourceAddress.description: The sourceAddress the response is coming from.  Broadcast frame has no reply.

startAddressLow.description: If function code is 1 (write), no these segments.

startAddressHigh.description: If function code is 1 (write), no these segments.

endAddressLow.description: If function code is 1 (write), no these segments.

endAddressHigh.description: If function code is 1 (write), no these segments.

crcLow.description: CRC low bit (crc is not included)

crcHigh.description: CRC high bit (crc is not included)
